name: Creamy Banana Pecan Paletas
description: These creamy banana pecan paletas (banana pecan popsicles) have only 3 ingredients, are vegan, and refined-sugar free!!
recipeIngredient: 5  Bananas, ripe, peeled, (cut into rounds, and frozen overnight)

recipeInstructions.text: Freeze peeled and cut bananas overnight in a Ziploc bag.
recipeInstructions.name: Freeze peeled and cut bananas overnight in a Ziploc bag.

recipeInstructions.text: The following day place the bananas and almond milk in a blender or food processor and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: The following day place the bananas and almond milk in a blender or food processor and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: If the mixture is too thick you can add some more almond milk.
recipeInstructions.name: If the mixture is too thick you can add some more almond milk.

recipeInstructions.text: You must work quickly otherwise your bananas will start to turn brown.
recipeInstructions.name: You must work quickly otherwise your bananas will start to turn brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the banana-almond milk mixture into a cold bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the banana-almond milk mixture into a cold bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add half of the chopped pecans and mix well with a spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Add half of the chopped pecans and mix well with a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop the banana mixture into your popsicle molds and top with a generous sprinkle of chopped pecans.
recipeInstructions.name: Scoop the banana mixture into your popsicle molds and top with a generous sprinkle of chopped pecans.

recipeInstructions.text: Insert popsicle sticks and freeze overnight.
recipeInstructions.name: Insert popsicle sticks and freeze overnight.

keywords: banana paletas, homemade paletas, vegan paletas
